Original Sin Story ―to―

原(げん)罪(ざい)物(もの)語(がたり)　(　)―(―)to(to)―(―)genzai monogatari ―to―

Original Sin Story ―to― is a pre-release of Original Sin Story ―Punishment― released by mothy on December 31, 2021 at Comiket 99, containing the first two chapters of the novel.

Translations: Recollective Musicbox · Ma Survival: Opening
